video.title: Airwolf
video.synopsis: Renegade pilot Stringfellow Hawke and his buddy Dominic carry out dangerous military missions aboard the high-tech, armored helicopter Airwolf.

episodes.synopsis: When the world's deadliest helicopter is hijacked, an elite CIA division calls in Stringfellow Hawke and Dominic Santini to recover the aircraft.
episodes.title: Airwolf: The Movie (Pilot)

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Moffet uses Airwolf to destroy a U.S. Navy warship. Hawke's girlfriend goes undercover to investigate, but she ends up getting captured.
episodes.title: Shadow of the Hawke: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While Hawke investigates a pilot suspected of treason, his personal connection to the events complicates a hostage situation with the Russians.
episodes.title: Daddy's Gone a Hunt'n

episodes.synopsis: After Dom and a young stowaway crash-land in Mexico, it's Hawke and Archangel to the rescue. But they don't know they're flying into a trap.
episodes.title: Bite of the Jackal

episodes.synopsis: Hawke is sent to the U.S.S.R. to collect a spy. But when he wants to take his family with him, Hawke must unload Airwolf's weaponry to make room.
episodes.title: Proof Through the Night

episodes.synopsis: Dom is hired to perform a stunt for a movie, but Hawke thinks it's too dangerous. Archangel suspects the shoot might be a cover for an actual crime.
episodes.title: One Way Express

episodes.synopsis: Hawke awakens from a coma to learn that Dom and Archangel died while searching for Hawke's brother. But things aren't what they seem in this hospital.
episodes.title: Echoes from the Past

episodes.synopsis: After her Nazi-killing father is murdered by Helmut Kruger, Sarah seeks Hawke and Santini's help to go to Paraguay to avenge her father's death.
episodes.title: Fight Like a Dove

episodes.synopsis: Dominic's aircraft is attacked, and $2 million is stolen. Dom is viewed as a suspect, and Hawke must work fast if he wants to save his friend.
episodes.title: Mad Over Miami

episodes.synopsis: In North Limbawe, Hawke learns the general of South Limbawe is employing Hawke's old war buddy, who might have information about St. John's location.
episodes.title: And They Are Us

episodes.synopsis: Hawke agrees to test a new Airwolf simulator designed by Dr. Robert Winchester, but the two butt heads over the simulator's fidelity to the real deal.
episodes.title: Mind of the Machine

episodes.synopsis: Hawke and Dom hide Airwolf from a bureaucrat intent on bringing it back under government control. A female pilot is eager to work for Hawke's company.
episodes.title: To Snare a Wolf

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a friend's disappearance, String is turned into prey by a brutal sheriff who arrests him, then releases him in a wildlife area.
episodes.title: Sweet Britches

episodes.synopsis: Dominic's friend claims he's seeing UFO lights. When Dom discovers they're coming from a renegade general, he tries to stop his nuclear agenda.
episodes.title: Firestorm

episodes.synopsis: While on a covert mission to Russia, Airwolf is hit by a computer virus. If it isn't swiftly defused, the bug will turn Airwolf into a death machine.
episodes.title: Moffett's Ghost

episodes.synopsis: When Dominic's niece is rescued from her violent boyfriend, he sends thugs after her. A series of strange incidents are underway at Santini Air.
episodes.title: The Truth About Holly

episodes.synopsis: Carter Anderson III hires Santini Air to take him on an important trip. But Caitlin's new boyfriend seems to be in on a plot to assassinate Anderson.
episodes.title: The Hunted

episodes.synopsis: String and Dominic fly to the island where Dominic's daughter died. But Dominic is arrested for the murder of his ex-wife. Can String find the killer?
episodes.title: Sins of the Past

episodes.synopsis: String asks Caitlin to join the Airwolf crew and help rescue a captured Archangel, who has been instructed to kill the F.I.R.M.'s leader, Zeus.
episodes.title: Fallen Angel

episodes.synopsis: When a high-tech helicopter is stolen, String suspects his brother is involved. Can he uncover the truth before the F.I.R.M. shoots the chopper down?
episodes.title: HX 1

episodes.synopsis: Caitlin is aboard a plane that's hijacked and forced to crash into the ocean. String and Dominic set out in the Airwolf to rescue the passengers.
episodes.title: Flight #093 is Missing

episodes.synopsis: After learning that a group of terrorists stole an experimental aircraft computer, the Airwolf team travels to the bad guys' mountain hideout.
episodes.title: Inn at the End of the Road

episodes.synopsis: String learns his brother might be in a POW camp and joins two Vietnam vets for a rescue mission. But upon arrival, nothing goes according to plan.
episodes.title: Once a Hero

episodes.synopsis: Out filming aerial footage, String and Dominic discover a mobster hiding out in the desert, and the Don sends his team of thugs to retrieve the film.
episodes.title: Random Target

episodes.synopsis: String and Caitlin are exposed to a virus at an Alaskan research station -- as are the crew of a Russian sub. Can they work together to stay alive?
episodes.title: Condemned

episodes.synopsis: A former warlord threatens Vietnamese immigrants, forcing them to pay him. When some of them stand up to him, the Airwolf crew steps in to help.
episodes.title: The American Dream

episodes.synopsis: String and Dominic help out a country singer whose ex-husband and manager has decided her death would increase album sales and help pay off his debts.
episodes.title: Out of the Sky

episodes.synopsis: A group of terrorists take String and a journalist friend of his hostage while the members finalize their plans to annihilate a hydro-electric plant.
episodes.title: Dambreakers

episodes.synopsis: Dominic rescues a billionaire and later learns that the man died and left him an inheritance, creating tension among some of the man's employees.
episodes.title: Santini's Millions

episodes.synopsis: The Airwolf team gets involved when Doc is forced to provide medical care to a former dictator who's just been busted out of prison by his daughter.
episodes.title: Prisoner of Yesterday

episodes.synopsis: The Airwolf team gives a runaway a job, but his quest for vengeance against the drug smugglers who killed his uncle threatens to cause problems.
episodes.title: Natural Born

episodes.synopsis: After the F.I.R.M. denies a former employee his benefits, he threatens to reveal secrets. String and the Airwolf team must thwart his plans.
episodes.title: Severance Pay

episodes.synopsis: When a volcanic eruption forces String and Dominic into an emergency landing, they discover some disturbing practices in the town where they set down.
episodes.title: Eruption

episodes.synopsis: When American students find themselves trapped in South America during a coup, String attempts to rescue them -- and gets taken hostage.
episodes.title: Short Walk to Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Hawke is lured into the clutches of criminal John Horn. Horn has designs on a small country and hypnotizes Hawke into using Airwolf as a weapon.
episodes.title: The Horn of Plenty

episodes.synopsis: The more advanced Redwolf helicopter's pilot has a vendetta against Hawke, which leads to an airborne battle between the two powerful choppers.
episodes.title: Airwolf II

episodes.synopsis: When a kidnapped aircraft engineer suffers a heart attack, the captors target his autistic son, believing that he knows his father's secret designs.
episodes.title: And a Child Shall Lead

episodes.synopsis: When Archangel seemingly vanishes, the F.I.R.M. is convinced he's turned traitor. But a desperate Dominic calls in a psychic to help find him first.
episodes.title: Fortune Teller

episodes.synopsis: Hawke must protect a scientist and his daughter. When mercenaries kill the scientist, Hawke and the man's daughter must fend for themselves.
episodes.title: Crossover

episodes.synopsis: A high-tech laser device is stolen from the F.I.R.M. while en route to a testing ground. A betrayed thief in the heist helps Hawke track it down.
episodes.title: Annie Oakley

episodes.synopsis: When some thermonuclear detonators are stolen, Hawke tries to find them with Airwolf's thermal sensors. But the man who stole them plans to use Airwolf to transport them. And part of his plan is seducing Caitlin.
episodes.title: Kingdom Come

episodes.synopsis: Hawke and Caitlin join forces to defend a village from a scientist's deadliest creation: an unmanned tank that's virtually indestructible.
episodes.title: Jennie

episodes.synopsis: Faulty intelligence led Hawke to wrongly target a Vietnamese village. Now, the survivors have taken Hawke's companions and their families hostage.
episodes.title: The Deadly Circle

episodes.synopsis: Hawke finds his estranged brother living in a small town, where a population of hippies stands ready to follow him in a deadly anti-nuclear protest.
episodes.title: Where Have All the Children Gone?

episodes.synopsis: Santini's friend Big Cec has tried to reconnect with his son, who works at his father's company. Turns out his real job is running drugs for VIPs.
episodes.title: Wildfire

episodes.synopsis: Criminal mastermind John Horn gives orders to kill a woman in the desert. But she miraculously survives when she stumbles upon Airwolf's hiding place.
episodes.title: Discovery

episodes.synopsis: Hawke must protect Tess Dixon until she can testify against her crime lord husband. But Hawke, once linked with Tess, discovers he still loves her.
episodes.title: Day of Jeopardy

episodes.synopsis: During Caitlin's sorority reunion things go bad when a kidnapping is attempted.
episodes.title: Desperate Monday

episodes.synopsis: Hawke is ambushed after turning down an offer to join a gang of mercenaries, ending up on the run from both the assassins and the F.I.R.M.
episodes.title: Hawke's Run

episodes.synopsis: Hawke tries to help a friend's son stuck in a Mexican jail. But when Hawke's cover is blown, Caitlin and Santini must mount a rescue of their own.
episodes.title: Break-In at Santa Paula

episodes.synopsis: Hawke sees a woman dropped from a helicopter, but she can't remember who wants her dead. He'll find out when her assailants try to finish the job.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Fell from the Sky

episodes.synopsis: When Dom dies, his niece takes over Santini Air. Teaming up with Jason Locke and Mike Rivers, Jo uses Airwolf against a mercenary named Blackjack.
episodes.title: Blackjack

episodes.synopsis: Accused of being a spy, Jo finds herself locked away in a Bulgarian prison and must team up with another prisoner who used to be a Soviet gymnast.
episodes.title: Escape

episodes.synopsis: While testing out new helicopter equipment, Jo crashes and disappears. St. John was flying right behind her, but he has no idea what happened to her.
episodes.title: A Town for Hire

episodes.synopsis: After a run-in with terrorists, Agent Grant notices disturbances near and above her home at night. St. John and Mike uncover a plot involving the KGB.
episodes.title: Salvage

episodes.synopsis: A foreign agent might be planning to sabotage the launch of a strategic defense satellite, forcing St. John and the Airwolf team to go undercover.
episodes.title: Windows

episodes.synopsis: Jo and Mike take a group of troubled youngsters on a camping trip. But the excursion goes south when a mob boss sends in his thugs to do a job.
episodes.title: A Piece of Cake

episodes.synopsis: Locke and a Russian agent are assigned to observe the disposal of a nerve gas supply. But a rogue American colonel has his own game plan.
episodes.title: Deathtrain

episodes.synopsis: Accused of murder, Steven Coombs asks St. John to defend him. Locke, Mike and Jo investigate and find information about why the victim was killed.
episodes.title: Code of Silence

episodes.synopsis: St. John discovers that a deadly virus has been created at Bar-Med Pharmaceuticals, and he's taken prisoner and infected with the toxic strain.
episodes.title: X-Virus

episodes.synopsis: When St. John is suspended, his life spirals out of control. But this is part of a plan by St. John and Mike to find the mole within their ranks.
episodes.title: Rogue Warrior

episodes.synopsis: In a plot to restore his honor, a shamed former Japanese pilot kidnaps an unsuspecting St. John and orders him to destroy a nuclear power plant.
episodes.title: Ground Zero

episodes.synopsis: St. John tries to evade a hit man by hiding in the mountains. When an avalanche threatens a woman, St. John calls in Airwolf, revealing his location.
episodes.title: Flowers of the Mountain

episodes.synopsis: A radical group of pacifists have taken control of 20 nuclear missile silos, and the group's leaders demand that all nuclear weapons be disabled.
episodes.title: The Key

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Herzfeld agrees to give information to the Americans. But while impersonating Herzfeld, Mike is kidnapped by terrorists who want training.
episodes.title: On the Double

episodes.synopsis: A general stole $300 million, converting the cash into diamonds that are now missing. The general comes looking for them and takes St. John prisoner.
episodes.title: Storm Warning

episodes.synopsis: Jo hears that her former boyfriend died in a plane crash. To prove he's still alive, Jo and the team travel to Afghanistan, where trouble awaits.
episodes.title: The Golden One

episodes.synopsis: After visiting Dr. Sylvia Robertson, Locke is attacked and implanted with a special mind-control device that orders him to retrieve Airwolf.
episodes.title: The Puppet Master

episodes.synopsis: A madman gets his hands on nuclear waste and claims he'll use the materials to destroy the planet, before breaking into Airwolf's secret lair.
episodes.title: Malduke

episodes.synopsis: The Airwolf team wants to put a stop to a drug-smuggling ring led by St. John's former commander, who isn't the same man St. John used to admire.
episodes.title: Poppy Chain

episodes.synopsis: Airwolf's mission is to assist in the testing of a super-secret aircraft that's being developed by Jo's father, who can't get along with his daughter.
episodes.title: Flying Home

episodes.synopsis: An old love interest comes to St. John looking for assistance with her aircraft charter service, and is asking him to help her smuggle illegal goods.
episodes.title: Welcome to Paradise
